meanings.definition: To engage in playful teasing or banter.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children would bant with each other, laughing and joking.
meanings.sent2: Friends often bant with each other to show their affection in a light-hearted way.
meanings.sent3: The siblings would bant back and forth, trying to outwit each other with clever remarks.
meanings.sent4: As the comedians took the stage, they began to bant with the audience, creating a fun atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends would always bant when they got together, making everyone smile.
